
# Jade

  The jade template engine for node.js

## Synopsis

    jade [-h|--help] [-v|--version] [-o|--obj STR]
         [-O|--out DIR] [-p|--path PATH] [-P|--pretty]
         [-c|--client] [-D|--no-debug]

## Examples

  translate jade the templates dir

    $ jade templates

  create {foo,bar}.html

    $ jade {foo,bar}.jade

  jade over stdio

    $ jade < my.jade > my.html

  jade over s

    $ echo "h1 Jade!" | jade

  foo, bar dirs rendering to /tmp

    $ jade foo bar --out /tmp

  compile client-si
